entry.title: What to do when it is hot, hot, hot
entry.summary: Where to go on the hottest day of the summer? The pool at Umpqua Community College was the choice for many Monday afternoon. As the temperatures soared to triple-digits, families enjoyed the refreshing feel of the Winchester waters.

entry.title: Roseburg to Mark International Overdose Awareness Day on Aug. 23

entry.title: U.S. 101 to fully close south of Bandon Sept. 19–21 for culvert replacement
entry.summary: U.S. 101 will fully close Sept. 19 (9 p.m.)–late Sept. 21 near Bearhead Mountain Ln, ~6 miles south of Bandon, to replace a deep culvert in constrained terrain. No local detours; use US-199 → I-5 → OR-42. Expect single-lane closures before and after.

entry.title: Roseburg hits 105°F, breaking August 11 record - hottest day of 2025 so far
entry.summary: Monday reached 105°F at the airport, the hottest day of 2025 so far and a new Aug. 11 record (old mark 104° in 2014). Tuesday should top out near 100°, below the 1935 record (106°). Gradual cooling begins Wednesday, with near-normal highs by Thursday.

entry.title: Roseburg Woman Killed, Driver Injured In Garden Valley Road Head-On Crash
